item.title: Padding Oracle Attack in CBC-mode
item.description: This post is about padding oracle attack in CBC-mode block ciphers. A padding oracle is a decryption function which leaks validitidy of the encrypted data, it allows an attacker to decrypt encrypted data without any knowledge of the key. It’s very simple yet elegant attack which can lead to full plaintext recovery by just observing the decryption oracle errors. Padding As the name suggest, block ciphers encrypt/decrypt messages in blocks of certain size.
